meanings.definition: A Russian musical instrument with a triangular body and three strings.
meanings.sent1: The musician played beautiful melodies on the balalaikas.
meanings.sent2: At the concert, the band featured a solo with the balalaikas.
meanings.sent3: During the music class, the teacher accidentally sat on the balalaikas!
meanings.sent4: The sound of the balalaikas filled the room like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: Children in the village danced to the cheerful tunes of the balalaikas.
